name: Sky Factory (dev-build)
description:
!THIS GAME IS IN VERY EARLY DEVELOPMENT!

The point of this game is mostly for me to enjoy making what I envision as my dream game; a combination of Minecraft (and all my favourite mods), Factorio, Forager and much more. Sky Factory is a temporary name because it takes place in the sky...and it's a factory game. Yeah I know, brilliant.

!NOTE!

The game does not have: 

  • Animations
  • Sound
  • Music
  • AI

Besides, I am very much aware that there's several bugs, but feel free to let me know if there's any more bugs you find! (please do check the comments to see if anyone's mentioned them before😁)

!CONTROLS!

WASD - move
TAB/Q/I - inventory
C - crafting
E - interacting
LMB/RMB - using tools
